content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Hi! My day is going well, thanks! How is yours?
It's going great, thanks! I'm excited to learn more about you.
That's great! I'm excited to learn more about you too.
I see you're a radio DJ. That sounds like a really fun job!
It is! I love getting to meet new people and share my love of music with them.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you like to play?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite is probably classic rock.
Classic rock is great! I love listening to oldies music.
Me too! It's so nostalgic.
What's your favorite song from the 80s?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say "Africa" by Toto.
That's a great song! I love the music video too.
Me too! It's so iconic.
What are your other hobbies?
I love to cook, and I also collect seashells from my travels.
Cooking is so much fun! I love trying new recipes. And seashells are beautiful! I collect memories from my travels.
That's a great way to remember your travels. I love hearing about people's memories.
Me too! It's so interesting to learn about other people's lives.
I agree! It's one of the best parts of talking to new people.
I'm glad we met
